alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 11 at 2:56PM MST until December 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226, 227, AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226, 227 and 237. * Winds...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
